name: Global Techno Solution
tag_list: access-control-systems-chennai, security-surveillance-cameras-chennai, cctv-cameras-chennai, home-surveillance-systems-chennai, wireless-surveillance-systems-chennai, cctv-surveillance-systems-chennai, remote-surveillance-systems-chennai, security-camera-
description: GTS is reputed dealers of CCTV cameras.
overview:
GLOBAL Techno Solution is one of the reputed dealers of surveillance and security systems. We are the dealer of a comprehensive range of surveillance cameras, CCTV cameras, digital recorders, access control systems, colour dome cameras, hidden cameras.

We undertake all types of surveillance systems, CCTV systems, Touch screen for classrooms and meeting rooms, Industrial security system, Home Security systems based on RFID, biometric identification, ad video techniques, video & audio conferencing, Fire protection, Alarm Detection, spy camera, locking devices, Video door phone, pen camera, voice detector, networking& installation & server setup.
